title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Internships
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Internships            Internships         Interns at African Burial Ground NPS  Internships play an integral part in preparing our youth for their futures and for the future of our country. Learn how African Burial Ground N.M. is doing its part by hosting interns to work at a national memorial and learn its history, as well as the relationship of the park site's history to that of our nation.   Â    2015 Summer Internship Program at African Burial Ground National Memorial
